alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Robeson, southeastern Dillon and northwestern Marion Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 111 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sellers, or near Marion, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marion, Dillon, Mullins, Latta, Lake View, Sellers, Fork, Blue Brick, Zion, Floydale, Smithboro, Kemper, Marietta, Mcleod Medical Center and Carolinas Hospital System - Marion. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 5 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
